description: A sweetly spiced condiment with eastern flavours.
name: Indian Mango Chutney Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2 large mango, peeled, de-seeded and chopped

recipeInstructions.text: Heat up a saucepan to a medium heat and add the sesame oil to the pan.
Fry the ginger and nigella seeds for 2 minutes.
Add the rest of the ingredients and bring to the boil for 2 minutes.
Reduce the heat and allow to simmer for 1 hour stirring occasionally.
Prepare a suitable sealable container by placing it in boiling water to sterilise it and allow to cool.
Remove the chutney from the heat and allow to cool before placing into the storage container in the fridge overnight before using.
